meanings.definition: To cause physical or mental distress
meanings.sent1: Her loud music was paining my ears.
meanings.sent2: The thought of losing her pet was paining her heart.
meanings.sent3: The noisy construction work was paining the neighbors' patience.
meanings.sent4: The constant criticism was paining his spirit.
meanings.sent5: The intense workout was paining her muscles.
